name: toolbar-dial
description: Toolbar Dial is a browser extension that replaces the New Tab page with a colorful grid of bookmarks and folders.

scripts.start: rimraf dist-demo && cpy public/thumbs/* dist-demo --flat && cross-env PROJECT=demo parcel ./src/demo/index.html --open --no-cache --dist-dir dist-demo
scripts.build:firefox: rimraf dist-firefox && cpy public/firefox/* dist-firefox --flat && cpy public/firefox-fix/* dist-firefox/dist --flat && cpy public/thumbs/* dist-firefox --flat && cpy public/icons/* dist-firefox --flat && cross-env PROJECT=firefox parcel build ./src/extension/firefox/*.html --no-cache --public-url ./ --dist-dir dist-firefox
scripts.build:chrome: rimraf dist-chrome && cpy public/chrome/* dist-chrome --flat && cpy public/thumbs/* dist-chrome --flat && cpy public/icons/* dist-chrome --flat && cross-env PROJECT=chrome parcel build ./src/extension/chrome/*.html --no-cache --public-url ./ --dist-dir dist-chrome
scripts.build:demo: rimraf dist-demo && cpy public/thumbs/* dist-demo --flat && cross-env PROJECT=demo parcel build ./src/demo/*.html --no-cache --public-url ./ --dist-dir dist-demo
